sent.orig: The kettle (ie The water in the kettle) is boiling.
Stainless Steel Electric Kettle and Tea Kettle, ect.
Should I use an electric kettle, or a whistle kettle on a hob?
sent.trans: 我们应该使用电水壶还是叫嘴壶呢？

sent.orig: Polly, put the kettle on. Polly, put the kettle on.
sent.trans: 波利，把壶盖上。波利，把壶盖上。

sent.orig: A reaction kettle is the modification of a reaction kettle structure in prior art stirring device.
sent.trans: 一种反应釜，是对已有技术中的反应釜结构的改进。
